metadata.mission: Update claude-foundry skills to document new foundry-mcp 0.5.0 capabilities. CONSTRAINTS: (1) Follow docs/claude_code_best_practices/04-skills.md and 11-mcp-consumption.md (2) SKILL.md <500 lines, references one level deep (3) New reference files >50 lines need TOC (4) Use router+action MCP pattern (5) Progressive disclosure - core in SKILL.md, details in references
assumptions: All skill modifications MUST adhere to docs/claude_code_best_practices/04-skills.md and 11-mcp-consumption.md guidelines
SKILL.md body must stay under 500 lines and reference files must be one level deep (no chaining)
New reference files over 50 lines must include a Table of Contents
MCP tool documentation must use router+action pattern: mcp__plugin_foundry_foundry-mcp__<router> action=\"<action>\"
Use progressive disclosure - keep core workflow in SKILL.md, move detailed examples to reference files
